title: Eldritch Blast
desc:
Post 1600
Do 1d10 damage to a player. player draws cards equal to damage.
- Also, choose 2 Effects:
- Agonizing Blast: Eldritch Blast also does an additional 1d5 damage. If you roll 1, reroll, once.
- Armor Of Shadows:  You also gain 3 **Shield.**
- Ascendent Step: You also leave the game until your next turn.
- Aspect Of The Moon: Your turn can no longer be skipped and effects that require your turn to be skipped to end instead end instantly.
- Beast Speech: <:green:1106234108042031166>, <:lime:1108048230542999633>, and <:slightlylightergreenbutwithalitt:1120008660454744117> cards are played twice when you play one.
- Beguiling Influence: You also draw Charm of Charm, (1410) but it's a 1/6 chance instead of a 1/8.
- Bewitching Whispers: Every other player gains **Bewitched,** and the next time they target you with a card, they must target someone else or lose the effect.
- Bond Of The Talisman: Discard a card. Also, gain 666 points towards <:partisan:1107460550268559380>.
- Book of Ancient Secrets: draw any Book card and immediately play it.
- Chains Of Carceri:
Whenever you play a <:purple:1106247148607131711> card, choose a player. Skip their turn.
- Cloak Of Flies:
You are surrounded with an Aura that looks like buzzing flies. Whenever you play a <:green:1106234108042031166> or <:brown:1107516362903007232> card, everyone else draws the other color of card, you have a 50% chance to draw one.
- Devil's Sight: You may choose to remove the effect of a <:black:1106265022453268530> card when played by anyone.
- Dreadful Word: Everyone else draws a <:purple:1106247148607131711> card.
This card would have had more effects, but I hit the char limit.
